Message:
That was the first thing
that came out of her mouth.

She was nothing like
the person I knew...

It was as if some doppleganger
was parading around in her body.

But, I only knew her from
the few times we met.

though I was under
the impression she
wasn’t that type...

I obeyed the Pope’s commands
and used my powers to
seek out witches.

I found them lurking
in places high and low—

from hidden villages,
to even the Church.

Though, I wonder why
she suddenly gave the order
to search for witches...
